message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Clarify: vote only, not editing">
Thanks â€” to clarify, you were only being asked for your vote on Option B (move terminology to glossary intro), not to apply any edits. The translator will handle all revisions. So: do you agree with Option B? Just a yes/no + one sentence is fine.
</teammate-message>

input.content: Yes, I agree with Option B. The terminology discussion functions as reference material and belongs next to the glossary, not in a narrative preface.
